post.description: Use this API to allocate goodwill points to a user group.

goodwillRequest.comments: Customer is Good, Award him 100 pts.

message.example: Input is invalid, Please check request parameters or input xml/json, No identifier provided to get loyalty users.

put.description: Update transaction or customer merge requests.

type.description: The type of request.    **Values**: `TRANSACTION` - For transaction request                      `CHANGE_IDENTIFIER` For customer merge request

basetype.description: The base type of the request.    **Values**: `REGULAR_TXN_ADD` - For transaction request                      `MERGE` - For customer merge request

id.description: The unique identifier of the request, generated during the POST call to add the request.

status.description: The status to which the request should be changed. **Values**:  `APPROVED`, `REJECTED`, `CUSTOM`

comments.description: Additional comments or notes related to the request.
